articles.description: Japan's biggest airline is making the most of grounded planes while Australian carriers are cutting prices.
articles.content:
By Justin HarperBusiness reporter, BBC News
Japan's biggest airline is offering first-class dining on a parked plane at $540 (£392) a meal.
All Nippon Airways (ANA) started offering the service on … [+2164 chars]
